issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Methods for opening Photo gallery (openPhotoGallery) and Show Camera methods are not working on android 4.0.4 version
fields.summary: Open Photo Gallery and Show Camera Methods are not working on Android 4.0.4 version with Titanium Studio 3.1

comments.body:
Not work with titanium_mobile 3.2.0.v20131122125648, at least "Show Camera".
Tested in real android device 4.2.1 and Genymotion 2.1 with android 4.3
I confirm that working fine with 3.1.3.GA
